info.name: Central Messaging - Admin Only
info.description: Complete admin-only endpoints for Central Messaging v1 API. All routes require admin authentication.

request.description: Login as admin. Save the returned token to the adminToken variable.
Debug admin authentication - verify token is working
Send message as admin to any contact
Send WhatsApp message via unified endpoint
Send bulk messages via unified endpoint
Send broadcast message to multiple coaches
Get all inbox messages across coaches
Get conversation with specific contact (admin view)
Get conversation with contact (returns WhatsApp + Email)
Get all contacts across all coaches
Search all contacts by name, phone, or email
Get all contacts with 24hr window info
Create template (Admin or Coach) with variable selection
Get all templates across all coaches
Get messaging analytics with date filters
Send test email via central email system

item.name: Get AI Knowledge Base by ID

request.description: Handle WhatsApp webhook from Meta (Public endpoint)
Get all WhatsApp devices across coaches
Get available variables for template creation (with selectable UI format)
Get available parameters for template assignment
